text:
Tribute to actor Saeed Jaffrey

Saeed Jaffrey, one of the first Indian actors to successfully establish a career in both Hindi cinema and British movies, was remembered on Monday at this year’s Bafta awards. Jaffrey, a Bafta nominee for My Beautiful Laundrette , died at the age of 86 late last year.
title: BAFTA-JAFFREY
